informations.title: How Does the Transfer Process Work?

boxes.title: Reserving Your Vehicle
boxes.description: Your reservation is confirmed instantly. In case of a change of plans, you have the right to cancel free of charge up to 24 hours before the scheduled pick-up time.

boxes.title: Meeting Your Driver
boxes.description: We will greet you upon arrival and direct you to your vehicle. Your driver will be waiting for you even if your flight arrives early or is delayed.

boxes.title: Reaching Your Destination
boxes.description: Reach your destination safely and comfortably. Avoid taxi queues and public transportation hassles.
